unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, zaroori hai! Specially after that hailstorm near Karnal on 20/03/2024. Heard Ramlal lost everything. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps, but paperwork is tough, no? 10 AM deadline always feels like a rush. Rs. 5000 claim barely covers costs sometimes. Need simpler options, maybe by Diwali? Heard NABARD is working on it. 14/04/2024 is Baisakhi, hope for better harvests! Remember 02/10? Gandhi Jayanti, and prayer for good rains!
normalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyya, zaroori hai! Especially after that hailstorm near Karnal on twentieth March two thousand and twenty four. Heard Ramlal lost everything. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps, but paperwork is tough, no? ten A M deadline always feels like a rush. rupees five thousand claim barely covers costs sometimes. Need simpler options, maybe by Diwali? Heard N A B A R D is working on it. fourteenth April two thousand and twenty four is Baisakhi, hope for better harvests! Remember second October? Gandhi Jayanti, and prayer for good rains!
